extendedInfo.description: The SIS Global Forum 2012 is an E&P conference for oil and gas executives and professionals and the providers of upstream software and service solutions. The Forum provides a unique opportunity to gain insights from key industry leaders, share experiences with your peers, and hear about the latest advances in Schlumberger softwareâ next-generation productivity, integration, and extensibility. The SIS Global Forum 2012 offers executive and technical sessions that discuss strategies to help extract maximum value from software technology and servicesâto clearly understand the impact of technical risk and improve the quality of your results.
